title: PS5 Questions Answered - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.06.20
description:
Greg and Blessing wade through all the PS5 reviews and news to bring you a PACKED Roper Report.

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:40 - Housekeeping
Extra Life is happening. This Saturday starting at 10am pacific time you can catch the whole Kinda Funny crew and our shenanigans for 12 hours straight as we’ll be raising money for the Children’s Miracle Network of hospitals. Catch it all going down live right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames.
and also community stream hosting starts friday @ 1pm pt
And remember you can go to kindafunny.com/extralife to donate
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:06:40 - PS5 Review Round-Up
00:27:50 - You CAN’T Store PS5 Games on an External Hard Drive, Shannon Grixti @ Press Start
00:30:00 - You CAN’T put PS5 Saves on a USB, Austin Goslin @ Polygon
00:32:50 - PT’s Strange PS5 Journey, Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:38:25 -  Ad 
00:41:30 - Spider-Man: Miles Morales Review Round-Up
00:54:16 - Astro’s Playroom Review Round-Up
01:02:05 - DELAYS
01:05:40 - Hope For Fortnite on iOS, Marie Dealessandri @ GIB
01:06:10 - Square Enix Reports Disappointing Avengers Sales
01:13:15 - Out today
01:15:10 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing & Tim
TUE: Blessing & Imran
WED: Greg and Gary Whitta
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Blessing
